banner.title: WHO WE ARE
banner.description: We are a democratic activist collective working for the liberation of Palestine, committed to openness,inclusivity, antiracism, decolonisation and solidarity with First Nations people in this country.

Vision.title: Our Vision
description: Build networks and solidarity to empower the Palestinian people. Elevate Palestinian voices through art, culture, social and political education and activism. Empower people to achieve the end of apartheid, the right of return for Palestinian refugees and equal rights for all populations in historic Palestine.

Mission.title: Our Mission
description: We aim to collaborate with other Palestine solidarity organisations. We will contribute to grassroots campaigns initiated by Palestinian organisations and initiate our own campaigns.

We aim to encompass as many Palestinian community voices as possible to give them the best opportunity to actively support the organisation's vision. We seek to grow and continually involve more activists. We welcome members who commit to anti-Zionism and respect our vision statement.
